text: Breslau was the name given to a wolfpack of German U-boats that operated during the World War II Battle of the Atlantic in 1943 from 2 October 1941 to 29 October 1941. ==Breslau== The group was responsible for sinking 7 merchant ships (), 2 warships (2,795 tons) and 1 warship damaged (6,746 tons). ===Raiding History=== {| class="wikitable sortable" style="margin: 1em auto 1em auto;" style="margin: 1em auto 1em auto;" |- !
